sentences.sContent: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.sCn: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.sContent: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.sCn: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

synos.tran: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起

words.tran: 可建议的；耳根软的；易受影响的
提示地；引起联想地；暗示地
建议；示意；微量，细微的迹象

remMethod.val: sug + gest(运， 载) → 将自己的想法运出来 → 建议， 提议

trans.tranOther: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc
